title: Anywhere / Nowhere / Everywhere
objective: Llegeix cada frase i tria la paraula correcta: anywhere, nowhere o everywhere.
explanation: anywhere ➔ ‘a qualsevol lloc’. S'empra sobretot en frases negatives o interrogatives (We aren't going anywhere). En afirmatives pot significar ‘a qualsevol lloc del món’ / ‘pertot arreu’ (He can go anywhere in the world).
nowhere ➔ ‘enlloc’. Expressa absència total (It's nowhere to be seen, You're going nowhere) i també s'usa en sentit figurat (‘no progressar’).
everywhere ➔ ‘a tot arreu’ o ‘pertot arreu’. Indica presència universal en frases afirmatives (There was sand everywhere).

questions.sentence: There was ___ to sit in the park
We couldn't go ___ because of the rain
